author: coindesk.com
title: MARA Sets Post-Halving Record With Highest Bitcoin Production Since January 2024
description:
said it produced 950 bitcoin BTC last month, the most since January 2024 and 35% more than in April, while setting a new company record by winning 282 blocks, up 38% month-over-month. 
The record, powered by MARA’s proprietary MARA Pool, also comes after the …
